thought: The Slack action (action_2) failed due to missing or incorrect parameters. Slack message sending requires specific parameters including 'select', 'channelId', 'messageType', and 'text' with expression to extract from input_data. I will add these parameters properly to the Slack action.
plan: Set 'channelId' mode to 'name' and value to 'general' to target #general channel.
Set 'text' to '={{$json["text"]}}' to extract message text from input_data.
Test Slack message sending with these params.
criticism: Currently, action_2 has empty params, which causes execution failure. Proper Slack params are mandatory for message sending.

tool_input.comments: Send messages to Slack channel #general with proper parameters.
